kuusisto.tinysound.internal

Class MemMusic

  • java.lang.Object
    • kuusisto.tinysound.internal.MemMusic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Music

    public class MemMusic
extends Object
implements Music
    The MemMusic class is an implementation of the Music interface that stores all audio data in memory for low latency.
    Author:
    Finn Kuusisto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MemMusic(byte[] left, byte[] right, Mixer mixer)
      Construct a new MemMusic with the given music data and the Mixer with which to register this MemMusic.

        right - right channel of music data
        mixer - Mixer with which this Music is registered

        double volume,
        double pan)

        Specified by:
        play in interface Music
        Parameters:
        loop - if this MemMusic should loop
        volume - the volume to play the this MemMusic
        pan - the pan at which to play this MemMusic [-1.0,1.0], values outside the valid range will be ignored

      • setPan

        public void setPan(double pan)
        Set the pan of this MemMusic. Must be between -1.0 (full pan left) and 1.0 (full pan right). Values outside the valid range will be ignored.
        Specified by:
        setPan in interface Music
        Parameters:
        pan - the desired pan of this MemMusic

      • unload

        public void unload()
        Unload this MemMusic from the system. Attempts to use this MemMusic after unloading will result in error.
        Specified by:
        unload in interface Music
